review: Very nice doctor she is very polite n good explaination **** **** ** *** **** *********  must visit .

Doctor was very friendly…
Explained everything properly..
*** *** ** ********* *** **** ****…
Thank you all the service

She did not use any numbness gel to numb the area and she tried to remove the cap from the tooth which was so painful.. After realising that she used numbness gell *** ***** ******** *** ****** **** *** ******* * ******* ** *** *** **** **** *** she instantly tried the 3nd attempt which was even more painful which bought tears into my eyes. Root canal was also not so painful but today's experience was really bad.
Thank you for giving hope in my broken tooth, and making everything alright, Thank you for making me feel better from my pain.
Dr.Reetu explain the treatment really well, clear all your doubts and made the treatment easy for me i am happy

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Checkup (General),Surgical Tooth Extraction,

Nice dr.
